channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Will Rename the Defense Department the Department of War: What to Know
item.description: The president has said the name “just sounded better” than Defense Department, a name that has been in use since 1949.

item.title: Chinese public is divided over whether to seek global dominance or share leadership
item.description: A new poll shows a majority of Chinese people see competition with the U.S. as a threat, but there is a split on what role Beijing should take on in t...

item.title: Elon Musk Could Become First Trillionaire Under New Tesla Pay Package
item.description: Tesla’s board unveiled a compensation package for the chief executive that could be worth $900 billion if he meets ambitious targets.

item.title: The world's oldest and largest iceberg will soon be no more
item.description: The iceberg, known as A23a, has been on a journey following the current into warmer waters for months. Now, it has begun the predicted and natural pro...

item.title: Mounting Deportations Meet Slow Hiring in a ‘Curious Kind of Balance’
item.description: An influx of immigrants helped ease worker shortages, and now their expulsion is helping to mask the country’s weakening demand for labor.

item.title: Questions Focus on Cable in Lisbon Funicular Crash
item.description: Images of recovery efforts in the accident, which killed 16 people on Wednesday, appeared to show damage to a cable connecting the funicular’s two car...

item.title: For first Black woman to design cars for Ford, passion for cars was a family affair
item.description: In this StoryCorps, Emeline King, the first Black woman to design cars for the Ford Motor Company, remembers her inspiration: her father.

item.title: 'One and done' dose of LSD keeps anxiety at bay
item.description: People with generalized anxiety disorder improved significantly after they got a single dose of LSD powerful enough to induce a psychedelic trip.

item.title: Trump to Sign Order Renaming the Defense Department as the Department of War
item.description: The president is turning back the clock to the name the agency held until shortly after World War II.

item.title: Why the end of the de minimus tariff exemption is causing shipping chaos worldwide
item.description: Planet Money looks at what the de minimis tariff exemption is, who wins and loses with the end of this policy and why ending it has resulting in shipp...

item.title: Questions Focus on Cable in Lisbon Funicular Crash
item.description: Images of recovery efforts in the accident, which killed 16 people on Wednesday, appeared to show damage to a cable connecting the funicular’s two car...

item.title: Why Hamas Refuses to Give Up Fighting
item.description: Analysts say that despite its vast losses in Gaza, Hamas believes it can hold out for a deal that ensures its survival.

item.title: A Nighttime Raid
item.description: An investigation details a previously undisclosed U.S. operation to intercept the North Korean leader’s communications.

item.title: French Winemaker Gets Prison for Selling Fake Champagne
item.description: Didier Chopin, 56, was accused of passing off wine made with carbonated grapes from Spain and other regions in France as Champagne.

item.title: Western Troops in Ukraine Before a Peace Deal Would Be ‘Targets’, Putin Says
item.description: The Russian leader made the threat a day after European leaders said they were willing to deploy forces on the ground to secure an agreement to end th...
